column4: hello! i have installed ubuntu and everything was going great exept for one thing my internal mic i tried everything but it just wont work or even show in the sound properties or in alsa , can anyone plzzzz help to get it work???
with hat program are you trying to get the audio from the mic?
i tried it with wat already came with ubuntu
and then downloaded alsa pack
but still it wnt see it
you're talking about an internal mic. So I guess that's a laptop right? What's the model?
yup its sony vaio ns240E
did you try alsamixer?
yes
i did
and still it wont find it
what version of Ubuntu are you running?
im using ubuntu 9.10
I saw
I'm googling a bit ;)
ok just makin sure
tyt cuz i tried google also and tried alot of the sudo stuff but didnt work
ok ill read it and comeback to u
that alot mimor
thx*
